name: Beach Wedding
description: Whether or not you’re actually getting married at the beach, this wedding style is all about pairing nature-inspired details (seashells, driftwood, tropical flowers,

name: Tropical Wedding
description: Bright colors, eye-catching details, and playful elements like citrus fruits and oversized greenery are all elements of tropical wedding stye.

name: Bohemian Wedding
description: This style is for the hippies (or hippies-at-heart of the world. Bohemian wedding style is best known for flower crowns, oversized bouquets, mismatched bridesmaid dresses

name: Classic  Wedding
description: Classic wedding style is ideal if you’re looking to evoke timeless elegance and the utmost sophistication on your wedding day.If you're looking to create an event that's luxurious, chic

name: Glamorous Wedding
description: If you love to make a statement, glamorous wedding style might be the perfect fit for you. It’s a fabulous opportunity to go all out with your wedding details, from sparkly table linens and strands

name: Minimalist Wedding
description: For couples embracing a “less is more” mindset, minimalist wedding style is a great alternative to other aesthetics that put an emphasis on elaborate details and statement-making pieces.
